class.name: panda_torque_mpc/ModelPinocchioVsFrankaController
class.description: A controller that only compares Rigib Body Dynamics Algorithm values computed from Franka and pinocchio.

class.name: panda_torque_mpc/JointSpaceIDController
class.description: A controller that tracks a self generated joint trajectory using PD+ control.

class.name: panda_torque_mpc/TaskSpaceIDController
class.description: A controller that tracks a self generated end effector trajectory using task space PD+ control.
